news.Header: Its time to celebrate EloBuddy's birthday
news.Content:
After days and months its time to celebrate EloBuddy's first birthday. Celebrating EloBuddy's birthday, we decided to allow all members to use our Buddy-only addons starting today till the 26th of September. 
https://www.elobuddy.net/topic/40974-its-time-to-celebrate-elobuddys-birthday/
EloBuddy has been updated for patch 6.19 and is undetected and safe to use.
The Buddy-only week is now over. You are now required to have the Buddy rank again to use Buddy-only scripts. Consider buying it from the shop: https://www.elobuddy.net/upgrade/category/2-elobuddy/
EloBuddy has been updated for patch 6.20 and is undetected and safe to use.
